    • Constructor Detail

      • File

        public File(java.lang.String name,
            int size,
            boolean writable)
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new file
        size - The size of the new file
        writable - The rights on the new file; writable or not.
        Effect:
        Creates a file with the given name, size and writable. If the name is not valid the default name "File_x" is used, where x is a unique integer starting from 1. Creationtime is instantiated as the local time.

      • File

        public File(java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new file
        Effect:
        Creates a file with the given name. Default value 0 for size is used. If the name is not valid the default name "File_x" is used, where x is a unique integer starting from 1.

    • Method Detail

      • isValidName

        public static boolean isValidName(java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        name - The name to be checked
        Returns:
        Returns true if name is valid, false if not

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        Returns the name of the file

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
             throws UnauthorizedException
        Changes the file name
        Parameters:
        name -
        Postcondition:
        changes the name to the new defined name when the file is writable
            isWritable()
        Throws:
        UnauthorizedException - You are not authorized to change the name of this file | isWritable() == false

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns:
        Returns the size of the file

      • isWritable

        public boolean isWritable()
        Returns:
        Returns true if the file is writable and false when read-only

      • setWritable

        public void setWritable(boolean writable)
        Parameters:
        writable - the new writable value
        Postcondition:
        the rights are updated to the new writable state

      • getModificationTime

        public java.util.Date getModificationTime()
        Returns:
        Returns the last modification time of this file

      • getCreationTime

        public java.util.Date getCreationTime()
        Returns:
        Returns the creation time of this file

      • getMaxSizeLimit

        public static int getMaxSizeLimit()
        return Returns the maximum size limit

      • setMaxSizeLimit

        public static void setMaxSizeLimit(int limit)
        Parameters:
        limit - The new size limit
        Postcondition:
        The maximum size limit changes for all files to the new limit

      • getMinSizeLimit

        public static int getMinSizeLimit()
        return Returns the minimum size limit

      • setMinSizeLimit

        public static void setMinSizeLimit(int limit)
        Parameters:
        limit - The new size limit
        Postcondition:
        The minimum size limit changes for all files to the new limit

      • enlarge

        public void enlarge(int size)
        Parameters:
        size - The size to increase (in bytes)
        Precondition:
        The size must be a valid size
            size >= 0 && getSize() < getMaxSizeLimit() - size
        Throws:
        UnauthorizedException - You are not authorized to change the size of this file | isWritable() == false

      • shorten

        public void shorten(int size)
        Parameters:
        size - The size to increase (in bytes)
        Precondition:
        The size must be a valid size
            getSize() >= getMinSizeLimit() + size && size >= 0
        Throws:
        UnauthorizedException - You are not authorized to change the size of this file | isWritable() == false

      • getUsePeriod

        public double getUsePeriod()
        Returns:
        Returns difference in seconds between last modification time and creation time Returns 0 when file hasn't been modified

      • hasOverlappingUsePeriod

        public boolean hasOverlappingUsePeriod(File other)
        Returns:
        Returns true when use periods overlap When this File is null, other file is null or modification times don't exist the standard value false is returned
